availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Webster County farmer. North Carolina native. Married Nancy Phipps Cates in 1817. Father of Richard Cates, Sarah Cates, and Elias Cates.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-029-0571. Jordan Dodd, Kentucky Marriages, 1802-1850, Ancestry, Hopkins County, 1817. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 141. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 147. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, District 4, Subdivision 192, p. 1.
